title: Unable to Open LoL
body: I have been having multiple issues while opening League. Over the last 2 days I've downloaded LoL 3 times, because every time i close down LoL it wont open it won't open again. This sucks because I've been planning to get some new skins with extra money I have, but need to wait 3 hours because I'll have to download the game again. So if you believe its my computer or wifi, then let me know.

replies.body: This may not be an issue with the download, but settings with your OS that may be blocking the patcher from opening.  Without permissions it can't launch, so I recommend running through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow league as an exception.  I hope that helps!
Thank you for the help. I'll try it out. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
